Educational Qualifications: B.A., L.T. Educated at D.S. Degree College, Alligarh, Uttar Pradesh
Other Information: Imprisoned in Aligarh, Naini and Benaras Jails during emergency; Protem Speaker, 13th U.P. Legislative Assembly

Positions Held:

1977
Minister of State, Health, Uttar Pradesh

1980

1985-2002

1991

1997
Chief Minister, Uttar Pradesh
Leader of Opposition, Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly

2004
Elected to 14th Lok Sabha
National Vice President, Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP)
Chairman, Rural Development Committee
